website_summaries.verdict: The BeatsX Bluetooth earphones from Beats deliver strong audio performance and excellent wireless connectivity, aided by Apple's W1 chip.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass and clear highs
Includes W1 chip for fast, seamless connection with iOS devices
cons: No auto power-down or sleep mode
Sculpted sound signature not for audio purists

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Headphones only lasted about 5 weeks before they wouldn't charge or swicth on, I googled the problem and found its happended to other people. Tried the suggested fixes, but didn't work. I then had to do go Amazons technical support, who had obviously done the same google search and who then sent me to apples technical support, who , gues what , asked me to try the same things. Now waiting for them to sent a repair package. Generally not what I have come to expect from Amazon or apple
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of Bluetooth earbuds. The battery lasts long enough to forget about it, they are comfortable, you can carry them all day round. I wouldn't recommend them as a pair of gym or running earbuds, due to the long cabling they tend to fall from your shoulders especially when you jump around or you lie on the floor. Sound quality is above the standard for Bluetooth earbuds but nothing impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality (broke after 6 months)
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality I’ve had mine six months and already the glue has started to wear and I’ve had the ends of the earphones fall of and expose the battery. I know don’t want to take them out anywhere at risk of losing parts of it, can’t use the magnetic necklace function as the magnet could pull it off again. Don’t waste your money, there are many other earphones you could get for a similar or cheaper price at a much better property.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: once you get going its really easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: First time I decided to buy beats and I am liking the sound quality! The on/off button is not so intuitive as the responsiveness is unclear, there has been couple of times I physically had to remove it off my neck to see what was going on, whether on/off, waiting for a waiting etc... However, once you get going its really easy to connect. Battery life has been good so far. Wish it had the similar function for pause once you took our the earbuds our of your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Panda

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: The ear wings were broken within a few months. Not what you’d expect for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Hak

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: They really are worth the extra money! The battery life is insane truly lasts me on one charge 8.5hrs I have it on all day in one ear at work and then at the end of the 5 mins before the gym I charge it and it lasts well over 2hrs! Great sound quality looks great fits perfectly. Definitely the best Bluetooth headphones I’ve had so far
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Sboul

customer_reviews.title: Initially good stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Was great for the first 3 weeks, but then the light started flashing red and white and they kept disconnecting from my phone after a minute.
customer_reviews.author: raty

customer_reviews.title: As with all Beats, good for about six months, then they are faulty
customer_reviews.text: As with every pair of Beats headphones, they are great, for about a year or 18 months, and then ALWAYSone of the headphones will stop working. So when you see reviews on here that are positive, my bet is they are understandably in the first six months of purchase. So buy them by all means for six months, but for the price, not worth it. I tried to get mine fixed by Apple who I spoke to. They would charge more than the headphones cost to even look at repairing them so...
customer_reviews.author: Raoul Duke

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is really good and the battery life is as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought the headphones in September 2017 and so far I had no issues with them. The sound quality is really good and the battery life is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana

customer_reviews.title: Already not working...
customer_reviews.text: Not working after 4month of light use. Recharge function does not work anymore. Expensive buy that did not deliver the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Tatzkow

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 weeks. AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but they last such a short amount of time. Please look elsewhere. Buy from a company that actually test their product. Don't be fooled by the sturdy look and brand.
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These headphones simply stopped working after 3 months. The return window has closed with Amazon so I appear to be stuck with a £100 bit of useless plastic. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of headphones over the years, but I'd put these at the top of my list alongside my Bose Quietcomforts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hay

customer_reviews.title: Earphones don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace a stolen set of mine. I needed this product as I’m currently on the iPhone XS and my last three phone have all been the apple phones which do not have a headphones port. Now the product was working perfect when I first got them, however for some strange reason after about 2 months of fair usage the tiny LED on the power button started to flash pink. The earphones connect to my phone, but only for about three seconds, that’s when it starts to flash pink and disconnects, after that the earphones will not do anything at all, you can’t even turn them off!
customer_reviews.author: Owen Rixon

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and battery life are very good and for that alone they are worth the money. I get about 8hours use of a single charge and it holds it charge for a long time too. Range is a true 10m too. The only disappointment is that it doesn't auto shut off which is a small inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Leon8108

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just unlucky
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6 weeks, won't stayed connected !! After reading reviews and research the fault online it appears this is a problem with these earphones!! After lengthy phone call with Amazon support I was issued with a refund, can't fault them but I would advise not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Had for a month, and so far impressed. Initially you feel the deep bass, but after a few days it seems like the speakers settle and you don’t notice it so deep. Sooo convenient charging using iPhone wire, and so quick! When the charge runs out I struggle to reconnect to phone after charged- but I’ve discovered that if you let it try and connect, then leave it to stop and power itself down, then turn back on it seems to pick it up again. Really good sound quality though, I would definitely not purchase any other earphones as I’ve been spoiled by these for quality, ease and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless solution, average sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The implementation is great, seamlessly works with apple ecosystem however, the sound quality leaves a lot of room for improvement. The sound quality is average at best, really low value for money considering the price of these earphones. The fit of the earphone buds is also not ideal, leaving the ear feeling stretched or under pressure, this may be purely due to anatomical factors in this instance and may differ for everyone. Battery life is well below that advertised in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: too quiet. stopped working within 3 months, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds quality is good but no better than the £20 or £0 option I have used in the past. The reason I bought these is because the cheaper option kept stopping working after about a year so I hoped these would last longer. Alas they worked for a few months. You also can't return to amazon after 30 days so it is really difficult to get them replaced. These earphone offer nothing that the £30 versions dont apart from a brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tom (London)

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present and they’ve been great. You can charge them on an iPhone charger as well as the one supplied so one less thing to have to remember to take with you. Sound quality is great and it’s supplied with different size ear buds for comfort. Also supplied with a soft case. No more tangled wires or not being able to listen to music and charge phone at the same time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas. When she opened them on Christmas morning there was still ear wax on them from the previous owner, one piece was missing, the batteries would not hold their charge... They just did not work. I returned them on the 27th and according to the tracking they haven't even arrived yet. When they do finally arrive, god knows when, I will be deducted ten pounds from my original payment for the pleasure of having my daughters Christmas spoiled. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: william buchan

customer_reviews.title: REED BEFORE YOU BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it first for the battery life, fast charge and sound quality but I had problems with phone calls from the beginning. I heard the background noise with deafening force no is the person I spoke with. Regardless I used it every day to listen music or audiobooks. However since I had my daughter I didn’t touch the thing for 3 months and the glue started to dissolve (see pictures). It’s disgusting how sticky it is..... now I can not use it without removing the glue first.... a royal pain.... I expected a hell of a lot more from such an expensive product!
customer_reviews.author: Zsófia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely converted me from Sennheiser to Beats
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical about beats and didn’t want to be a sheep, they went on offer one day with Amazon’s TreasureTruck giving a price of like £40. I couldn’t resist and bought them. They’re so good, battery life, comfort and sound quality. The only downside, is when making a call the mic isn’t that good, maybe it’s Bluetooth issue or simply mic placement but every call I have to switch to phone.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great but broken after less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, good communication with Apple iPhone / iPad and my PC, easy to pair etc. Sound reasonable and comfortable to wear. The issue I have is the sound in one ear has now gone, this happened after less than six months, these have very bad build quality, a shame as it's such a good product - when it works! Update: these got replaced by Apple and again broke after ~6 months, Apple now refuse to replace the product as they are out of warrenty I simply can’t reccomend this product if they break every 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also they don't sound anywhere near as good as the AirPods
customer_reviews.text: My pair failed completely after about 3 months of use. Also they don't sound anywhere near as good as the AirPods, which I bought when my beats failed
customer_reviews.author: Clare Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these to the Airpod's
customer_reviews.text: These are simply fantastic! I returned the Apple Airpods and they just wasn't a good fit for me and I have a lot of Apple products so thought I'd try the Airpods first. The BeatsX are a lot more comfy and fit really well, come with different tips too. I'm happy with the sound and people have said they they arent "bassy" enough but let me assure you. these give superb sound!
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: I use my Beatsx all day.  Every day
customer_reviews.text: These things are brilliant - having had them for a few months, they are now almost permanently around my neck. They are super lightweight, highly durable and my must-have companion for the day. I use them on the commute to listen to tunes, and all day at work I use them for calls. They sound amazing, are incredibly comfortable, and are a joy to use. The fast-fuel feature means that with only a few minutes charge I can get another hour or two of playback. I've noticed that mine can charge from dead to 100% in less than 20 minutes. One of the best purchases I have ever made - do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Flloyd Harntrotter-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved these however
customer_reviews.text: Unit stopped working after just over a year of very rare use. Pairing is super easy if you are in the apple eco system already and sound quality is decent from a pair of buds. Found the magnetic clip useful when wearing around neck. Feel for the cost these should at least be sweat resistant and the build quality better as seems to be an on going issue with reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: On the beginning sounds really bad for me
customer_reviews.text: On the beginning sounds really bad for me, but the reason was ear buds. You get more earbuds in Beats package, but those earbuds are really bad for me, too thick and uncomfortable. So I replace from my old earphone witch was cheap sony. And I can say quality depends as well and on earbuds. My advise: 1) Change earbuds 2) Use Poweramp app to adjust beatter sound After all its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justas

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a year!?!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this headset but just over a year after purchase it has totally stopped working. I’m not comfortable that I paid almost £130 for something and it only lasted a year!!?! Errrm, No! Not good enough. Really disappointed with Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Ndidi1st

customer_reviews.title: 2 pairs broken within the year
customer_reviews.text: Lucky for EU regulations to have these repairable for free within 2 years, my 1st pair's remote and mic stopped working. These were replaced after 5 months. The replaced pair then just stopped turning on, or one of 10 times they turned on, after 30 secs turned off again. Seems like an issue many thousands have had reading online, yet Apple said there was no known issue. Sent back to repair and the repair got lost. I've decided to not trust this brand anymore. Pity, as the earphones had great batter life, sound and were lightweight/practical, but if they can't last longer than 6 months without breaking down, they deserve to be listed at 1/4 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: RUBBISH, Very badly assembling
customer_reviews.text: Beats = very good looking chinese products. Very cheap products covered with a nice shell. This is what Beats is. Replaced twice on warranty and still having, last month I've received another pair on warranty and now is broken again, straight into the bin. No reason to spend your money on this brand. Instead you can buy better for less, less money!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Were fantastic for first five and half months
customer_reviews.text: Were fantastic for first five and half months. Then just stopped working. Apple going to replace them, but looking online, this seems to be a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These were faulty so I had to send them back for a refund. Decided not to order again and get them through Currys instead and they worked brilliantly until they randomly stopped working. Wouldnt recommend as they dont last but I think they may have discontinued these anyway...
customer_reviews.author: TheWillowTree

customer_reviews.title: Worst & overpriced wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try these and it turned out that these headphones absolute rubbish. The wire is too long and it is very annoying and uncomfortable to wear. Sound quality is terrible they are so silent and do not produce any bass. But to be fair, it feels like materials that were used to make these headphones are of very high quality and very pleasant to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimirs

customer_reviews.title: No better than any other bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted the W1 chip bluetooth pairing without having to risk the airpods. But the W1 chip makes literally no difference with these, they're just as tedious to use as normal BT headphones. Also the rubber strap round your neck is made of weird feeling rubber. Only bothered to use them 3 times before I went back to my wired headphones. In the end I bought the AirPods anyway and that purchase worked out much better.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love them, good battery life and carry pouch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Had them for about a week now and they are just amazing, charging is really quick, battery life is great and there is a really cool rubber pouch which helps carrying them around. The packing is on point as always from Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Mirosalv Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Poor life cycle for an expensive product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: Dec 2017 - Died: Feb 2019 Worked well. Used nearly everyday for the full 8hr battery life. Sometimes twice. Experienced red/white blinking lights. Tried all manner of reset options, ( including beats updater app). The devices synced to the app then (I could change the name of the device on the beats website, whilst plugged in to my laptop) then soon as it’s unplugged... Red and white lights. I take meticulous care of all electronic products. Horrible life cycle for an expensive product. Little to no help if you don’t have access to a ‘Genius Bar’
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin G.

customer_reviews.title: I thought I hated Beats as fashion driven rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I thought I hated Beats as fashion driven rubbish, but I bought these as they were £88 and had exceptional battery life and quick recharge function - I travel a lot. Having joe used them for a month, the sound quality is excellent. Soundstage is good, highs excellent mids clear and bass managed - yep managed, not stupid. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had them a year and stopped working lights come on when charging but will not come on!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie baxter!

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: I use my BeatsX on the train on the way in to work, so not very actively. After 5 months of use the on/off button has stopped working and the headphones are useless and cannot be reset. Disappointing given the premium price of these.
customer_reviews.author: Pbezz

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMEND  - purhcased twice, product failed on both occasions, money down the drain
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Had a couple of these fail for various family members 1 - Stopped working in one headphone with devices just after the warranty expired, Apple Support very unhelpful, so effectively money down the drain just after a bit of light use. 2- stopped connecting with devices - not very useful. Apple have taken this back but this should not be happening for a set of headphones that are not cheap. I would advise against purchasing this product, expensive and poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Michael Platten

customer_reviews.title: Dont get for gym
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great so is the battery life, got these for the gym, poor design the lenght of cable is way too long, cannot change track via the earphones only the volume can be adjusted. Great for travelling bad for gym
customer_reviews.author: Danny Connor

customer_reviews.title: High quality you expect from Beats
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Beats headphones, my first wireless pair. Sound quality is excellent and very comfortable, I use them.for running with no issues. I'm not sure the battery lasts as long as described but that is probably down to the volume used. Overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesc

customer_reviews.title: Charges with iPhone cable
customer_reviews.text: Best ear phones open the box feel the quality instantly, great tone and volume, really wish I’d bought these earlier instead of cheaper ones . Battery life is great too and 5 min charge gives you two hours play , and the fact the charging port is same as iPhone cable is just ace , recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Dossett

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as it says. Charging times are very quick and getting just over 8hrs of use on a full charge. Highly recommend. Not as loud or as bassy as previous beats earphones I’ve owned but still worth the money. Very easy and simple set up. Very comfortable and haven’t had any problems with them falling out. Neck strap is very soft and haven’t had any rubbing. Very comfortable during prolonged usage
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I've now had 4 of these, 2 bought new and 2 as replacements. The problem is they simply don't last. After about 6 months they fail. Always the same way, flashing red and white lights. Tried the reset, tried the software updater. Nothing works, then they totally stop working. Amazon customer service was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: BuyBuyBuy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones would not turn on when about 10 months old. Apparently its a common problem, just Google it. Amazon's repair service are there to refuse all repairs it seems, saying that it's user abuse. It took them over a month to decide that. Headphones at this price should last longer imo, poor quality rubbish sold with a stars name on. Buy something else, the Anker range are good, and a fraction of the price. I
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box - and they don't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones 9 months ago, but only opened the box yesterday. I left them to charge for 45mins, but I get no response from the earphones. They don't turn on. I haven't been able to use them at all. I tried using a different power source, no luck. They still do not turn on. Update: The product was replaced as it was faulty. Further update: The right earphone has stopped working, it crackles and the light doesn't function. How long are these earphones supposed to last?? Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nabeel Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, slightly iffy battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The battery isn’t quite as long lasting as advertised but they’re my favourite headphones by quite a way. The noise cancelling in the description doesn’t seem that good compared to other over ear headphones though - I wonder if there’s a setting you can access by Bluetooth that I’ve failed to find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with apple devices
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with apple phones and watches. Great battery life. Sound quality is Well balanced. Less bass than previous generation Beats Tours earphones that I used before.
customer_reviews.author: ambari

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months. Rip off. Never buying Beats again
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after 4 months. Never buying another beats product again. Suffering from the same disconnect and flashing light issue as others have experienced. Utter garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Montana

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, noise isolated and feels really comfortable when wearing, but the sound wasn’t impressed me, still has Beats signature sound, but still not worth for money, should try Bose Soundsport wireless.
customer_reviews.author: TRAN

customer_reviews.title: not only mine didn't come with a three months apple music trial like my friends' did
customer_reviews.text: Im having the suspicion that I might have bought a knock-off, not only mine didn't come with a three months apple music trial like my friends' did, it also doesn't pair with my phone or my laptop properly which is extremely odd considering the fact that it has W1 chip inside...kinda suspicious...
customer_reviews.author: Elliott007

customer_reviews.title: Better than AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good sound quality, good noise cancellation, nice premium feel, excellent integration with iOS, much cheaper and better battery life than AirPods, and you are much less likely to lose them, too.
customer_reviews.author: bodhi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Broken after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable and pricey! Very disappointed! Bought July 2018, got broken after 14 months! The battery life has also started to reduce quite drastically after one year (few hours vc the claimed 8 hours!). I replaced them with a Sony wireless headphones costing 4 times less than beats price, having twice battery life and with an acceptable sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: The most practical Bluetooth headphones in the world
customer_reviews.text: When you need something that sounds great, and that’s as easy to use and AirPods but with noise cancelling. (...And for when people keep interrupting you and you have to take them out quickly without dropping them on the floor!). Also works with Android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E

customer_reviews.title: Seek alternatives, this isn't the best.
customer_reviews.text: As it goes with every big brand, just the name that sells it. Sound quality is mediocre, you have to push in just to feel the bass (yes, I've tried all 4 different attachments). The JVC Bluetooth one I purchased from Sainsbury's for £20 is more comfortable and has better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mahim Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build & sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality build and sound. Would like the battery to last a bit longer! A tad on the pricey side but hey, it is what it is!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: Great until they suddenly failed after just 15 months light use. Wouldn’t connect anymore not what you expect from a premium brand. At least amazon accepted them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lord

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed... I bought the product last year in May and it worked just about to get off warranty witch is only one year. Problem was battery witch was not charging anymore. I tried to replace it but they(apple store) asked me about £90 witch was way to much for this headphones. Overall sound is good but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio quality, never did i think id get a wireless pair of headphones but these are perfect, good battery on them too, very fast charge, 45mins and its fully charged is there completely run dry
customer_reviews.author: john croft

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: The worst headphones I’ve ever bought. Meant to last 8 hours only lasted 5 hours. Used twice for endurance events, battery died on me twice despite charging correctly. Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Cox

customer_reviews.title: Have not lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16 year old son for Christmas 2017. Its now November 2018 and the rubber part which keep the head phones in your ears have split. Very unhappy as they were so expensive and the only present I could give him last Christmas. I will be asking for a refund or replacement as they are still under the 1 year guarantee
customer_reviews.author: Claire T

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & bass battery life not the best
customer_reviews.text: My only fault would be the battery life, I use this all day at work and have to charge them towards the end of my working day but they fully charge in about 20 mins but apart from that brilliant !
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: They didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: At first they worked well then after a few weeks they said they were connected but music played out of the device still rather than the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Delly

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers default
customer_reviews.text: The product last at least two months and the faulty issue will start again flashing red light ,disconnect automatically, and the apple will replace the item and again the same issue, I changed my beat x earphone three times with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Tripathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery is very poor and doesn't last very long, and connection drops when more than 1 foot away from your phone. I had it in my pocket, and the connection dropped, this also drained the battery really fast. Really poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Furniss

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long, poor build quality and no where near worth the cost. I don't recommend unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: afinio

customer_reviews.title: Pre owed earphones, uncleaned, covered in ear wax
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, I bought these earphone knowing they were pre owned, this was fine, but the fact that I opened them to be covered in some fellas ear wax was quite shocking. To think that these were held at the amazon warehouse before being bought but no one ever thought to clean that to me is shocking?
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ... had wired beats in the past and really really liked them.
customer_reviews.text: Have had wired beats in the past and really really liked them... These are ok but I don't think the sound is as good (certainly not the bass) and don't find them all that comfortable. I use them and am happy enough with them but wish I had just bought a wired pair like before...
customer_reviews.author: James Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Way better quality than expected for beats - cool to just ...
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality than expected for beats - cool to just hand around your neck with the magnetic clip, perfect for work
customer_reviews.author: Callam

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: poor built, as many other users have written, it will not last even a year
customer_reviews.author: stefano r

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Love these, been using them every day in work as a wireless headset so I’ve two hands free to work. Battery lasts from morning till night. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gsherwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality with decent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound with good bass. Charging fast. Easy to carry. Having it as default listening device for daily commute or work meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, battery runs out very quickly, so hard to keep on top of it
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with those, it is soo hard to keep on top of the battery, it runs out soo quickly....I always end up using the wired ones in the end. Also if you have long hair, they get easily trapped it is a hassle to put them around, easier eir pods or wired.
customer_reviews.author: Miss N. Sposito

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Use all day everyday, good battery life, comfortable and don't fall out. Almost noise cancelling and no noise escapes them.
customer_reviews.author: alcos.s

customer_reviews.title: On the money
customer_reviews.text: All good so far. Don’t think the sound is quite as good as my previous expensive Bose in ear units, but value for money and quality they are absolutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Big Pete

customer_reviews.title: They break - Wouldn’t recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March ‘18, had them replaced on November ‘18 as they stopped working! The replacements then stopped working 4 months later. 7 days before the end of the original warranty. Going to get a 3rd replacement soon
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oldershaw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing AirPod alternative
customer_reviews.text: My second pair, brilliant sound quality well worth the price especially including the way pair Apple W1 chip
customer_reviews.author: W.clvn

customer_reviews.title: Great product - comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good sound. Comfortable to wear , sometimes you can forget you are wearing them and don’t know they are in your ears because they are soft and fit snuggly. Would have given it 5 stars but some times it’s hard to connect
customer_reviews.author: L Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones come with 4 different sized earbuds. To get the best sound, make sure you try all the options. Once you have the correct buds for your ears the sound is as good as the best on the market. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Iglooboy

customer_reviews.title: It will stop working after the return duration end.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine for 6 weeks, and all the sudden it stop working without reason, i want a replacement or my money back this is unacceptable it's from a manufactor so probably quick fix to get the headphone working again for short period and the it will stop working again.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Earphones of joy
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, blocks out the sound on the tube. Took a while to choose the correct fittings for my ear. But once I had the correct combination they work amazingly well
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: Beats earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, excellent sound, the simplest Bluetooth connection and good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Battery is pretty decent too
customer_reviews.text: Pairs and connects well with an iPhone - no effort here. Battery is pretty decent too. Sound however is just trash, the earpods an iPhone comes with is somehow quite a bit better, the audio quaility is equivalent to £5 knock-offs headphones.
customer_reviews.author: ScroatyMcBoogerBall

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works best on Apple devices
customer_reviews.text: Good earphones, has slight connectivity issues since I'm using an Android device however.
customer_reviews.author: N. Yip

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Earphones have stopped working after 6 months. They get disconnected after connecting. I wish I hadn’t purchased this from amazon. At least it would have been easier to have this fixed or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sudipto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beats
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones that are seriously superior. That said, the product has just stopped charging in just five months, so I need to take them to the apple store.
customer_reviews.author: Milz12

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone! Perfect for sports
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the Apple ear pod as they are far more secure during sports. Also love the speed charging.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and great battery, connecting is so easy with apple devices you dont need the w1 chip iphones to make it any eaisyer this connects to my older iphones no problem
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product . Way better then AirPods which u may end up losing one
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless earphones
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless earphones I've ever had. The battery lasts me about half the advertised time as I always listen on full blast but it's still worth it for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for these earphones is very good and I used them every day. However, after about 5 months they started playing up and didn’t connect for over 20 seconds. Sent them back and got the refund later that day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spink

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be all the rage. It was a present for my daughter and she loves them. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect these to last
customer_reviews.text: Ok sound and the Apple chip made it great to use and set up with my devices, but just a few weeks past the warranty and these have died and not able to be repaired. No help from Apple customer care. Don’t expect these to last I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Poynter

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these (as I thought I had lost a pair) and they both are faulty. They both have issues with retaining a charge. This also happened to my husbands so is not a coincidence. I would not buy these agaib
customer_reviews.author: K S.

customer_reviews.title: Big price, big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought these April 2018, now, end of Jan 2019, only 1 of the ear pieces are now working. Very Disappointing considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Earphones for Iphones- noise cancellation is great very handy and quick charge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of earphones and I paid 84 pounds for my beats x and they’re amazing so easy to connect and the audio quality is expected from beats which is incredible but no bose but never the less they’re amazing highly recommend over AirPods
customer_reviews.author: Sam Denny

product_meta.title: Beats by Dr. Dre BeatsX Earphones - Black
feature_bullets: Connect via Class 1 Bluetooth with your device for wireless listening
Up to 8 hours of battery life for when you’re on the go. With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 2 hours of playback when battery is low
Variety of eartip options offer personalized comfort, secure-fit wingtips provide stability and the Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort with easy purse and pocket portability
Authentic, clear acoustics deliver crisp sound fit for your life
With Siri-compatible RemoteTalk, you can take calls with an on-cable mic and play music with easy-to-use controls, seamlessly switching back and forth as you go about your day
